title: Footer Component
description:
Create Global Footer Component with Contact Information and Service Areas

Build a reusable, accessible footer component that displays company contact details, service coverage areas, copyright information, and social media links across all pages of the website.

Requirements:
- Use semantic HTML5 <footer> element for proper document structure
- Display contact information clearly:
  - Phone number with tel: link for mobile click-to-call
  - Email address with mailto: link
- List service areas prominently:
  - West Houston
  - Energy Corridor
  - Katy
  - Memorial
- Include copyright notice with dynamic year (e.g., © 2024 Company Name)
- Add social media links section:
  - Support common platforms (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn)
  - Use icon representations with accessible alt text
  - Make optional/configurable for future updates
- Ensure responsive design works on mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports
- Maintain consistent styling with site theme/brand guidelines
- Use proper ARIA labels for accessibility
- Ensure footer sticks to bottom of page on short content pages
- Keep footer visible and readable with sufficient color contrast ratios (WCAG AA minimum)
